DIRECT ENTRY/UTME  
(i) UNIZIK requires three (3)  'A' level passes in Biology, Chemistry 
and Physics or Mathematics.  
(ii) EBSU accepts HND/ND upper credit and NCE merit   
respectively in the relevant programmes  
  
UTME  
 (i)  EBSU does not accept Health Science.

 ENTRY  
MINNA accepts NCE/ND/HND credit  plus five (5) relevant 
UTME subjects.  
CALABAR  accepts  Economics  and  ND/NCE  in  
Mathematics/Statistics.  
MINNA requires Mathematics and Physics.  
CRUTECH accepts NCE, ND or HND in Statistics or related 
programme.  
MINNA  accepts Technical Drawing.  
UTME SUBJECTS  
MINNA  accepts Geography  and does not accept Biology.
